summary: Removes the tail from the Werewolf (user request)
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]Werewolf - remove tail [/b]

[img]http://666kb.com/i/cb1s3brzc99exipwl.jpg[/img]
[/center]
[b]This mod is based on an user request:[/b]
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/897759-okey-now-im-desperate/]http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/897759-okey-now-im-desperate[/url]

[b]INSTALLATION[/b]

Download file, open archive, drag&drop meshes folder to ...Skyrim\\data\\
To undo it just delete the .nif file (path on the image)

Don\'t use it if you\'re already using a Werewolf mesh replacer.

[b]I\'m taking a break from my own mod projects, just picking up small requests like this from time to time.
This mod is based on a single user\'s request, i won\'t change or add anything BUT share it just in case someone else wants to use this version as well.[/b]

Please don\'t message me, i pick requests myself - depends on my motivation and free time.

greetings
Ghosu
author: Ghosu
